My hobbies

Outside the digital world, I enjoy reading, exercising, and 3D design. Reading helps me stay informed and inspired, while exercising keeps me focused and energized. Additionally, 3D design allows me to explore my creative side and develop skills that complement my work. These activities contribute to my personal growth and well-being, which I believe is a good influence on my professional work.

I’m always open to new learning opportunities and collaborations, so feel free to reach out if you have a project in mind. Thank you for taking the time to check out my portfolio. I hope you enjoy exploring it as much as I enjoyed building it.
